titles.title: Where is The School For Each And All (easy nic

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where is the school For each and all Where men become As children small And little ones are great Where love is all The task and rule The fee our all And all at school Small poor of low estate{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where to unlearn All things I learn From self and From all others turn One Master hear and see I learn and do One thing alone And wholly give Myself to One Who gives Himself to me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My task possessing Nought to give No life to have Yet ever live And ever losing gain To follow Knowing not the way If He shall call To answer "Yea-all hail All shame and pain"{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where silent In His Holy Place I look enraptured On His Face In glory undefiled And know the Heaven of His kiss The doing nought The simple bliss Of being but a child{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where find the school To men unknown Where time and place Are past and gone The hour is ever now O soul Thou needest ask no more God tells thee Of His open door Still come And harken thou{/lang-eng}
